name: nbn

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(w0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wn(w0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(w0))
-| wn(w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wn(w0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wn(w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(w0)))

comment: The negation of a wff is equivalent to the wff's equivalence to falsehood. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Oct-2013.)
